vague_description: Bob needs to optimize his meal planning strategy to meet specific nutritional requirements while minimizing expenses.
detailed_description: Bob wants to design a diet consisting of protein bars and noodles. Assume that each serving of noodles costs \param{CostNoodles} and contains \param{CaloriesNoodles} calories and \param{ProteinNoodles} grams of protein. Assume that each serving of protein bars costs \param{CostBars} and contains \param{CaloriesBars} calories and \param{ProteinBars} grams of protein. He's interested in spending as little money as possible but he wants to ensure that his meals have at least \param{MinCalories} calories and at least \param{MinProtein} grams of protein per day. Formulate a linear programming problem that will help minimize the cost of the diet.
target_objective: Minimize the total cost of the diet consisting of noodles and protein bars
target_constraints: The total calories from noodles and protein bars should be at least MinCalories
The total protein from noodles and protein bars should be at least MinProtein
Number of noodle servings is non-negative
Number of protein bar servings is non-negative
target_parameters: Protein per serving of noodles in grams
Cost per serving of protein bars
Calories per serving of protein bars
Protein per serving of protein bars in grams
Minimum protein intake per day in grams
